information: Gold Scorpion S.L. - It is a wholesale exporter of fruit and vegetables from Spain. These include: Citrus (mandarin, lemon, grapefruit, orange, lime) Stone fruit (peach, nectarine, paragvayo, platerin, cherry, apricot, pomegranate) Vegetables (tomato, cucumber, pepper, eggplant, zucchini, potatoes, onions, garlic) Lettuces and fresh herbs (Iceberg, Romance, Lollo Rosso, Lollo Biondo, oak leaves, arugula, parsley, dill, cilantro, mint ...) Listed above are not the whole list of fruits and vegetables that are exported by our company. Update prices is happening every week, on Monday, all customers receive an e-mail message with an assortment and prices for the products offered If the client does not want to wait until Monday, he sent us a preliminary order for necessary to him products indicating all parameters (size, category, the net weight of the product in a box, view the box).
